EnglishLetics English for
Travel English for
Business

Lesson 1

Area: In the supermarket

Level: Basic

▶
The line starts here.
▶
That makes 12$ and 50Cts.
▶
Cash or credit card?
▶
Put the items in the basket.
▶
Where is the milk?

Level: Advanced

▶
Here is your change, sir.
▶
Can I get a discount on this?
▶
Sorry, this register is closed.
▶
I need a cart, not a basket.
▶
Try our freshly baked bread. We bake everyday.

Level: Professional

▶
We appreciate your patience in the queue.
▶
Thank you for your purchase with us today. Please come again.
▶
The cashier at the grocery store was very kind.
▶
I can't eat any dairy products! Do you have lactose-free milk?
▶
The price tag on this shirt was 10 dollars, not 15! You overcharged by 5 dollars!
